key.name: move-window-to-new-workspace
key.description: Enable or disable moving windows to new workspaces.

key.name: add-username-to-quick-menu
key.description: Enable or disable adding the username to the quick menu.

key.name: focus-launched-window
key.description: Enable or disable focusing launched windows.

key.name: lock-icon
key.description: Enable or disable the lock icon.

key.name: battery-percentage
key.description: Enable or disable showing battery percentage.
